I am a PhD student in Economics working primarily on migration and labor economics at the [Bordeaux School of Economics](https://www.bse.u-bordeaux.fr/) (University of Bordeaux) under the supervision of [Olivier Bargain](https://sites.google.com/site/bargainoliv/) and [Isabelle Chort](https://sites.google.com/site/isabellechort/).

I visited the [University Carlos III of Madrid](https://economia.uc3m.es/) from January to June 2025 with [Jan Stuhler](https://janstuhler.com/).
